data.title: Esri Foundation Level Certification Exams
data.meta_description: Is an Esri Foundation Level Certification Exam part of your certification journey? If so, this article presents the unique details related to the three Foundation Level certification exams.
data.text:
This article provides you with a quick look at key information unique to these exams, the level, and versions. As always, our key exam resources are the Exam Information Guide and Learning Plan located on the Exam Details Page and ArcGIS Documentation. We recommend that you subscribe to this article to receive notifications and click this link to Ask Questions.

Most Recent (and initial) Versions:

These are the initial versions of the Foundation Level certification exams, which can be found on our website: https://www.esri.com/training/certification-find-exam/search/#foundation

GIS Fundamentals Foundation 2201

ArcGIS Pro Foundation 2101

ArcGIS Developer Foundation 2201

GIS Fundamentals Foundation 2201

The 2201 exam version is designed for candidates with 100 hours of GIS coursework or 3-6 months of GIS workplace experience. The target audience includes roles with beginner level GIS experience such as: students taking GIS coursework, candidates seeking a GIS internships or entry-level positions, new geospatial analysts, developers creating applications for GIS programs.

Exam Details Page in Esri Academy Catalog

Published date: March 2022

Exam State: Available to the public

Exam Duration: 2 Hours, 5 Minutes

Coming 2024: Esri GIS Fundamentals Foundation 2024

ArcGIS Pro Foundation 2101

The 2101 exam version is designed for candidates with skills and experience with Esri software at between 0-2 years’ experience. The target audience includes roles such as: non-GIS industry specialists, educators, college students, recent graduates, and those seeking entry-level positions.

Exam Details Page in Esri Academy Catalog

Published date: December 2021

Exam State: Available to the public

Previous Version: ArcGIS Desktop Entry 19-001 (Link to Credly Digital Badge)

Exam Duration: 1 Hour, 35 Minutes

ArcGIS Developer Foundation 2201

The 2201 exam version is designed for candidates with skills and experience with Esri software at between 0-2 years’ experience. The target audience includes roles such as: App solution developer, GIS developer, GIS analyst, GIS administrator.

Exam Details Page in Esri Academy Catalog

Published date: January 2022

Exam State: Available to the public

Exam Duration: 1 Hour, 45 Minutes

Exam Comparison: Foundation Level Exams

Not sure which exam is best for you? When determining which exam level and version is best for you, open the Exam Information Guide from the Exam Details Page and compare the exam information. If you’d like to personal your approach, read this blog: A Personalized Approach to Exam Selection.

Experience: The GIS Fundamentals exam is designed for candidates with 100 hours of GIS coursework or 3-6 months of GIS workplace experience and both the ArcGIS Pro and ArcGIS Developer exams validate the skills and experience with Esri software at between 0-2 years’ experience.

Exam Duration: The GIS Fundamentals exam allows for 2 hours and 5 minutes, the ArcGIS Pro Foundation exam duration is 1 hour, and 35 minutes, and ArcGIS Developer exam duration is 1hour, 40 minutes.

Exam Blueprints are significantly different and shown on each Exam Information Guide: GIS Fundamentals Foundation, ArcGIS Pro Foundation and ArcGIS Developer Foundation.

Best to you on your Certification Journey!
